entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
